clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Epidemiology Study to Validate the BOMET-QoL-10 in Patients With Bone Metastasis in Germany

brief_summary.textblock: Translation and validation of the BOMET-QoL-10 questionnaire in Germany and assessment of its validity and responsiveness.

detailed_description.textblock: Aim of this study is to translate the questionnaire and to examine the psychometric properties of BOMET-QoL-10 in a German population. Correlations with the EORTC QLQ-C30/BM22 at the time of enrolment and throughout the study aim to verify that the BOMET-QoL-10 is reliable, valid and able to detect stabilization or changes in quality of life.

primary_outcome.measure: Validity and responsiveness of the BOMET-QoL-10 questionnaire in reference to EORTC QLQ-C30/BM-22

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of tumour entity, comorbidity and further parameters on the scores of bone metastasis at baseline
Sensitivity of BOMET-QoL-10 in patients with / without progression of the disease
Sequence effects (i.e. influence on the order questionnaires are filled out)

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with bone metastases from primary cancers of the breast, kidney, lung or prostate
